conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway rendering with clean geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent height and thickness; clean isometric projection. Minimal perspective distortion on far corners.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Significant layout divergence. The 3D model flips the kitchen and living area, omits the primary bathroom/closet block entirely, and misinterprets the laundry/hallway area.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is well-scaled and clean, but placed in the wrong zones due to layout errors (e.g., dining table moved to hall).

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and excellent lighting. Lost points due to missing structural openings (windows) on several exterior walls.

detected_errors.description: Missing entire bathroom and central closet block from the original 2D plan.
Fundamental layout swap: Kitchen/Dining area moved to the opposite side of the living room.
Missing windows on the left and rear elevations.

summary: The 3D transformation is visually high-quality and structurally sound, but suffers from significant layout inaccuracies and missing rooms compared to the source floor plan.
